text: Kasamh Se is an Indian television soap opera. It was produced by Ekta Kapoor of Balaji Telefilms. The soap opera aired on Zee TV. From 16 January 2006 through 12 March 2009, on Monday through Friday. The story is about three sisters: Bani, Pia and Rano. ==References== Category:Indian television series
title: Kasamh Se
